metadata.dc:author: Castells Rodellas, A
Betlloch Mas, I
metadata.dc:description: Sweat gland origin of Paget disease is demonstrated by the presence of carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA). We studied the expression of CEA and keratin in two cases of extramammary Paget disease. Our results are commented.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio inmunohistoquímico de distribución de antígeno carcinoembrinario y queratina en dos casos de enfermedad de Paget extramamario.
[Immunohistochemical study of the distribution of carcinoembryonic antigen and keratin in 2 cases of extramammary Paget disease].
